Text:

Dat image, I'm picking up Batman & Robin now, thank you.

that pic is from Batman #15, actually
batman and robin #17 is really cool, though

Thanks mirrormaster! and sorry to all the guys i was harrasing about this torrent. i was just confused cause i thought this came out before the single issue torrents. keep up the good work. much love to all the scanners

Azex88 it's cool. enjoy the comics and seed whenever you can.

hey what does everyone think about next week's justice league of america #1? if i counted right, there will be 54 variant covers (regular + combo+ 50 states + d.c. + puerto rico).

... and are empire or minutemen or novus going to up a 54 covers release?

... and vibe #1 ships the same day? are they trying NOT to find an audience for that series?
thanks dude! awesome job as always
can you upload Naughty & Nice Good Girl Art by Bruce Timm?

First of all, huge thanks for the great job you've been doing all this time!

2nd, I have a question about some technical issues.

When I open SOME files, all the pages in them appear as 1-pixel dots.

When I open them with an editing program, like MS paint, Gimp, Photoshop etc, they show up normally, and if I hit save, then I have no problem at all.

But is there anyway I can skip this and be able to see them right away? Could I be doing something wrong while un-cbr-ing them?

Hello, MirrorMaster82!

I see you have in this week's group of comics THRESHOLD #2.
However, I went back and check the last 10 "New 52" group posting by you -- and found that you hadn't included THRESHOLD #1 in any of them.  It went on sale on January 16, 2013.

The first issue was "The Hunted", spun off directly from GREEN LANTERN: NEW GUARDIANS ANNUAL #1. 
"Larfleeze steals the spotlight in his first ongoing series of backup stories! What happens when Larfleeze, the ultimate hoarder, is robbed...of everything?!?"

Here is a link to it for everyone: 
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8028522/ 

Thanks for you continued posting of DC now way beyond "New 52", MirrorMaster82!
